CatDescriptText: Shorts Davis was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Out column published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 3, 1970, pg. 4 with question: "What do you think of County Commissioners Staisey and Forester's recent appointment of Jim Slusser as Director of the Police Academy?" Answer reads: "I think Slusser will do a good job.  After all there are  two sides to every story..  Some like him and some don't.  He was doing a good job for the police force here.  If you do something wrong he's gotta do his job."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Shorts Davis wearing light colored zippered jacket moustache, and dark cap, standing in front of brick building with boarded up window, Hill District
